description: The denormalized manifest for file submission.

BiospecimenKey.description: Unique Biospecimen_id foreign key(s) that link metadata entries as part of the same collection. Please provide multiple values as a comma-separated list.
BiospecimenKey.title: Biospecimen Key

Component.description: Category of metadata (e.g. Tools, Publications, etc.); provide the same one for all items/rows.
Component.title: Component

DataUseCodes.description: DUO code - A data item that is used to indicate consent permissions for datasets and/or materials, and relates to the purposes for which datasets and/or material might be removed, stored or used. Available DUO code definitions can be found here: https://mc2-center.github.io/data-models/valid_values/file/#attribute-data-use-codes
DataUseCodes.title: Data Use Codes

DatasetViewKey.description: Unique DatasetView_id foreign key(s) that link metadata entries as part of the same collection. Please provide multiple values as a comma-separated list.
DatasetViewKey.title: DatasetView Key

FileAlias.description: A string identifier associated with the file. Must be unique. Can be the repository accesssion number (e.g., Synapse ID, GEO identifier such as GSE12345). No Greek Letters or DOIs.
FileAlias.title: File Alias

FileAnatomicSite.description: The anatomic site associated with the data contained in this file.

enum: Bones of skull and face and associated joints
Connective; subcutaneous and other soft tissues of abdomen
Connective; subcutaneous and other soft tissues of head; face; and neck
Connective; subcutaneous and other soft tissues of lower limb and hip

Long bones of upper limb; scapula and associated joints
Lymph nodes of axilla or arm
Lymph nodes of head; face and neck
Lymph nodes of inguinal region or leg
Other specified parts of female genital organs
Other specified parts of male genital organs
Overlapping lesion of bones; joints and articular cartilage
Overlapping lesion of bones; joints and articular cartilage of limbs
Overlapping lesion of brain and central nervous system
Overlapping lesion of connective; subcutaneous and other soft tissues
Overlapping lesion of endocrine glands and related structures
Overlapping lesion of eye and adnexa
Overlapping lesion of female genital organs
Overlapping lesion of floor of mouth
Overlapping lesion of heart; mediastinum and pleura
Overlapping lesion of lip; oral cavity and pharynx
Overlapping lesion of major salivary glands
Overlapping lesion of male genital organs
Overlapping lesion of other and unspecified parts of mouth
Overlapping lesion of peripheral nerves and autonomic nervous system
Overlapping lesion of rectum; anus and anal canal
Overlapping lesion of respiratory system and intrathoracic organs
Overlapping lesion of retroperitoneum and peritoneum
Pelvic bones; sacrum; coccyx and associated joints
Peripheral nerves and autonomic nervous system of abdomen
Peripheral nerves and autonomic nervous system of head; face; and neck
Peripheral nerves and autonomic nervous system of lower limb and hip
Peripheral nerves and autonomic nervous system of pelvis
Peripheral nerves and autonomic nervous system of thorax

Peripheral nerves and autonomic nervous system of upper limb and shoulder

Short bones of upper limb and associated joints
Skin of lower limb and hip
Skin of other and unspecified parts of face
Skin of upper limb and shoulder

FileAnatomicSite.title: File Anatomic Site

FileAssay.description: The assay(s) the file is representative of. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.

enum: Dynamic Susceptibility Contrast-Enhanced Magnetic Resonance Imaging
Focused Ion Beam Scanning Electron Microscopy
Fourier Transform Ion Cyclotron Resonance Mass Spectrometry
Human Induced Pluripotent Stem Cell-derived Cardiomyocytes Culture
Multiplexed Error-Robust Fluorescence In Situ Hybridization
Point Accumulation for Imaging in Nanoscale Topography
Quantitative Point Accumulation for Imaging in Nanoscale Topography
Single Cell Cytokine Detection Chip Assay
Single Molecule Forster Resonance Energy Transfer

FileAssay.title: File Assay

FileDesign.description: The overall design of the dataset or file.
FileDesign.title: File Design

FileFormat.description: The format of the file described by this entry.
FileFormat.title: File Format

FileLevel.description: The processing level the file can be mapped to.
FileLevel.title: File Level

FileLongitudinalEventType.description: The type of event to which File Longitudinal Total Time Elapsed is related
FileLongitudinalEventType.title: File Longitudinal Event Type

FileLongitudinalGroup.description: A label that can be used to identify groups of files from the same longitudinal/time-resolved experiment
FileLongitudinalGroup.title: File Longitudinal Group

FileLongitudinalSequenceIdentifier.description: The order in which this file was collected with respect to the longitudinal experiment (e.g., 1, 2, etc.). Integer.
FileLongitudinalSequenceIdentifier.title: File Longitudinal Sequence Identifier

FileLongitudinalSequentialTimeElapsed.description: The time elapsed between collecting the current and previous files in this longitudinal group.
FileLongitudinalSequentialTimeElapsed.title: File Longitudinal Sequential Time Elapsed

FileLongitudinalTimeElapsedUnit.description: The unit of time associated with Sequential and Total Time Elapsed attributes.
FileLongitudinalTimeElapsedUnit.title: File Longitudinal Time Elapsed Unit

FileLongitudinalTotalTimeElapsed.description: The total time elapsed between the first and current files contained this longitudinal group.
FileLongitudinalTotalTimeElapsed.title: File Longitudinal Total Time Elapsed

FileSpecies.description: The species the data was collected on. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
FileSpecies.title: File Species

FileTissue.description: Tissue type(s) associated with the file. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.

enum: Lymph Nodes of Axilla or Arm
Lymph Nodes of Inguinal Region or Leg

FileTissue.title: File Tissue

FileTumorType.description: The tumor type(s), if applicable, of the data collected. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.

enum: Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma
Liver and Intrahepatic Bile Duct Carcinoma
Liver and Intrahepatic Bile Duct Neoplasm
Thyroid Gland Noninvasive Follicular Neoplasm with Papillary-Like Nuclear Features

FileTumorType.title: File Tumor Type

FileUrl.description: The url of where the file is stored.
FileUrl.title: File Url

FileViewId.description: A unique primary key that enables record updates using schematic.
FileViewId.title: FileView_id

Filename.description: The path of a file in Synapse, relative to the project. The file associated with the path will be annotated with attributes contained in this sheet.
Filename.title: Filename

StudyKey.description: The unique Study_id foreign keys associated with the resource, found in the grant Study information. Used to group the resource with other components. Please provide multiple values as a comma-separated list.
StudyKey.title: Study Key

title: FileView_validation
